title: Sérgio Grilo
text:
Sérgio Filipe Grilo das Neves, known as Sérgio Grilo (born 17 February 1983) is a <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> retired <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and coach.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Segunda%20Liga">Segunda Liga</a> for <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Naval%201%C2%BA%20de%20Maio">Naval</a> on 10 December 2000 in a game against <a href="F.C.%20Marco">Marco</a>.
Personal.
He is the older brother of <a href="Paulo%20Grilo">Paulo Grilo</a>.
